Reviews.Title: Very Long Cable - Recommended
Reviews.Author: C. Hill "CFH"
Reviews.Content: These VideoSecu 150' Video/Power cable is exactly what I need to install the security cameras at the far end of my wife's building. We bought two of these cable and they worked perfectly with the cameras provided with our Zmodo Surveillance System with 8 Weatherproof IR Cameras PKD-DK0865-NHD.The cables are very thin, so care does need to be taken when running them. We noticed only slightly degraded image quality with the very long runs.Recommended!CFH

Reviews.Title: Thin but does the job
Reviews.Author: Portland Ghosts
Reviews.Content: This cable is not super durable and is very thin. Treat it well and it works great. Would be easy to cut or tear but at 150' for this price it's to be expected.

Reviews.Title: Its a 150' cable and it works like one
Reviews.Author: Boris
Reviews.Content: Until I run the conduit the cable has been ran along the ground. Until last week it has been covered in snow and ice. Not it gets snow at night and melts off during the day.The cable has held up well and has the same quality as the standard 60' cables that came with my DVR camera package.

Reviews.Title: Noise, shorts... cheap
Reviews.Author: Chris C.
Reviews.Content: I have a feeling there are lots of vendor reviews for this item...  This cable makes a 600TVL camera look like 100TVL.  I didn't expect much, but there are a lot of better options out there.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu 150 Feet Video Power Security Camera Cable for CCTV Surveillance DVR System Installation CBV150
Reviews.Author: krayzc
Reviews.Content: this is a great item to replace the shorter wires that were received with my security systems. Everything works great and there should not be a signal loss unless you get to around 800 ft.  I love it.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: amy
Reviews.Content: the cable alone is great! great plus with the extra pieces to connect to tv. i would of gave it a 5 if the cable wasnt so hard to untangle!!!!

Reviews.Title: Does not work
Reviews.Author: aerouta "aerouta"
Reviews.Content: Cable did not work at all. I used have tested it before routing. My only guess is that the quality of the cable is extremely poor that the data is completely lost. Terrible

Reviews.Title: Failed
Reviews.Content: I got to install it and Failed three weeks later. Simply lost connection.After I installed the camera and routed it through the ceiling and so, it stopped transmitting power so, i revised it and no damage appears, it seem perfect, but no power.

Reviews.Title: Does what it says -- no issues
Reviews.Author: Greg C.
Reviews.Content: What can I say? Performs as stated, no problems. I have learned to order the longer than you think you need lengths since attics seem to have a black hole that eats cable footage.

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed
Reviews.Author: Ruso Minnifield "PrinceHappy2"
Reviews.Content: This 150 Feet Video Power Security Camera Cable is just what I needed.  I can get that extra length without having to put two cable together.  Works great!!!

Reviews.Title: Great cables.
Reviews.Author: godschild
Reviews.Content: These cables worked as well as the ones that came with the cameras even at the extended distance, no degradation at all.

Reviews.Title: Bnc cable
Reviews.Author: JB
Reviews.Content: Just recieved this cable.  This is a lot better than what i had before and holds up very well. The manufacturer took a while to send it, but it was worth the wait. Thanks a bunch to the seller for responding quickly about the wait. I really appreciate it.

Reviews.Title: It works as expected
Reviews.Author: Herold A. Treibs "Tree Farmer"
Reviews.Content: My Zmodo surveillance cameras came with 60 foot cables.  I bought this 150 foot cable from Amazon, plugged it into the camera and control unit, and it works.  The picture is just as clear as with the shorter cable.

Reviews.Title: Very thin and weak cable. 2 out of 3 stopped working
Reviews.Author: Ray Armstrong
Reviews.Content: Very thin cable. Stopped working after 10 minutes after installation. I think that the cable is so thin and poor quality that the conductors probably broke due to very slight stretching of long cable during installation. Since the cable was installed I am not able to return it. Would not purchase this cable again.

Reviews.Title: waste of time and money
Reviews.Author: L. Sarver "awaken812"
Reviews.Content: I bought these cables for my surveillance camera to upgrade from the original ones I had which gave me lines across the screen. What a disappointing purchase. These cables were worst I don't get any picture at all. None. I tried everything and finally gave up and I am now using the old ones with lines across the screen. I am now seriously looking for a good quality cables but I am doing my research before buying anything. Amazon added these cables to my camera so I figured it would be good. Unless I got a lemon, either way is not worth the frustration. I never leave negative feedback but I am sure some of you like me don't want to waste money even though it was only $14.

Reviews.Title: Not working
Reviews.Author: Tony
Reviews.Content: something wrong with the wire it is not working, try to got contact to change no success, will never use them again, total lost the price the shipping money and the labor for the electrician who put it then take it off again ,

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly
Reviews.Author: L. McDurmon
Reviews.Content: Needed an extension for a home security system.  This cable provided the BNC and power that was required.Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive Outdoor Video Cable
Reviews.Author: BurninEmber
Reviews.Content: I have about 100 feet of shaded yard that I ran this cable across. It has worked fine, even throughout a week of tropical rain. I will eventually bury it and hope that it will continue to work. It is not sold as a 'direct burial' cable and it feels too thin to take much sunlight. For the price though, I am happy with its performance. The connectors mate with my Night Owl security system and the wire is supple enough to route very easily.

Reviews.Title: Worked perfectly!
Reviews.Author: James B
Reviews.Content: I needed this cable to place a camera further from the controller/DVR than the cables that came with the video surveillance system would allow.  It arrived quickly and was exactly as described.  I used it to install a camera focused on the detached garage and it worked perfectly.  I mean, you can't really get excited about a cable but it did exactly what I wanted it to do so I am very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Wires are of a thin
Reviews.Author: Wacko
Reviews.Content: When I received the cables, I was surprised how thin the wires were.  My original cables are twice as thick and twice as heavy.  This tells you why the price may seem low.  I believe the heavier cable is more able to carry signals better.  I guess you get what you pay for. If you want something cheap, then this is it.My original cables were purchased from supercircuits.com and they are really constructed well.

Reviews.Title: great cable bad packaging
Reviews.Author: ga boy
Reviews.Content: this is great quality cable but how they wind it is crazy, you have to unreel whole thing to use it.. it is doubled THEN rolled up, so you have to untangle it across whole yard, first then re roll, would be much better on a reel otherwise great cable great deal

Reviews.Title: Do NOT waste your money!!!
Reviews.Author: Philip Carlin
Reviews.Content: This cable is not worth $5.00, do not waste the time ordering this product. I am not sure what others have used in the past, but this product is poor quality! The product utilizes a common/shared wire between video and power--CHEAP! Just purchase CAT5 if you want to have quick install and great quality. Purchase Aposonic A-XVIDBAL Single Channel Passive Video Balun to connect the video, and purchase power wire---quick, clean and great quality!

Reviews.Title: Great quality!
Reviews.Author: Ray
Reviews.Content: Great quality, strong space saving line, good video performance & a very helpful staff, AAA+++!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Robert Mack
Reviews.Content: This item worked just fine.  I needed to extend my security camera connection and this work great.  Great buy.Remack

Reviews.Title: Lorex Camera system
Reviews.Author: Spiderman
Reviews.Content: Purchased at Costco a Lorex surveillance camera system and wanted to install a camera in my landscape area,  Painted a dark green and you have no idea its there.  The wire is good quality and had no noticeable effect on picture quality whatsoever.Great buy

Reviews.Title: OK item
Reviews.Author: John Shelton
Reviews.Content: I am experiencing extremely poor picture quality from the camera at the end of a 150 foot cable.  I do not know if the cable is causing the poor performance or something else.

Reviews.Title: Works great!!!
Reviews.Author: Debra Gallagher
Reviews.Content: Works Great !!!  Got this and a small camera to keep an eye on my chicken coop. Just bought way to much, lol. Will be buying more from this company!!

Reviews.Title: Video Power Cable
Reviews.Author: Tombstonebilly
Reviews.Content: This cable is what I needed but the way it was put into the bag was a mess It took me an hour or more just to get it untangled . Yes I would recommend This item but be very careful how you take it out of bag.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: As advertised.  Fairly decent quality, good connectors, length as advertise, would not use outdoors without conduit or adequate ruggadizing, but would do just fine indoors.

Reviews.Title: Was just what I needed to hook up security cameras
Reviews.Author: Sherri Hachmeister
Reviews.Content: We needed longer cables these worked great, cameras are up and going and we have peace of mind now great product

Reviews.Title: it is bad when you get a bad one
Reviews.Author: chente
Reviews.Content: connection between cable and bnc connector is poorly made, causes intermittent video loss. the price is really cheap though compared to store ones.

Reviews.Title: No Problems
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Purchased to install an additional camera outside a church.  Needed long cable to reach DVR and this one really fits the bill.  I have had no issues with these cables.  Used two on the initial install of 4 cameras.

Reviews.Title: Great Cable
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: These cables work fantastic, and produce a very clear clean image. I replaced some other brand cables with these because my image was very blurry, but haven't had a problem since replacing them with Video Secu brand cables!

Reviews.Title: The end is very short,
Reviews.Author: Sergio Santos
Reviews.Content: The side end is very short, it's can not connect if  receiver and far away more 6 inch from aux. so I don't recommend it to nobody also wire cannot split  , I had to move all my installation to get it installed

Reviews.Title: Not much to say.
Reviews.Author: kspike
Reviews.Content: It works for me since its just used for a camera to monitor my steps for visitors otherwise it's a fine cable for a non critical camera.

Reviews.Title: BNC Cable
Reviews.Author: Martrek Wingo
Reviews.Content: Bought this to reach across the entire attic so I can have my security cameras cover majority of my house. This cable did the trick with not my video quality loss. Be careful with the cord it tangles very easy. Other than that it does what it suppose to do.

Reviews.Title: Excellent cables at a good price.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: These cables seem well constructed and proper for the job.  You will likely need to get some gender adapters for the ends in order to use them as direct replacements for those cables shipped with the camera / DVR systems, as those are made as true extensions (male connectors on one end, female on the other).  These have the same gender connectors on each eand.

Reviews.Title: Skinny little wires
Reviews.Author: phoneguy
Reviews.Content: The wires and insulation are much thinner than should be used for long cable runs.  You can tell how thin by comparing the BNC connectors in the photo to the wire size.  Instead of a larger coax paired with a smaller power circuit, it's just one small circular cable.  Image quality is not great, particularly on night vision when the LED's turn on.Would have given it two stars, except that it's so incredibly cheap.

Reviews.Title: ARRIVED A DESCRIBED
Reviews.Author: gay reynolds
Reviews.Content: ARRIVED FAST AND AS DESCRIBED NOT AS HEAVY DUTY AS THE ORIGINAL BUT WORKS WELLREACHES WHERE I NEEDED. ENDS ARE BUILT WELL.

Reviews.Title: These are not the cables for you
Reviews.Author: Ralph Jackson
Reviews.Content: In my camera setup these cables caused interference when using with the power portion.  This interference caused moving scan lines on the picture of the video image.  This was only discovered after hours of troubleshooting and already running the cable through walls. The picture quality was degraded a bit once I isolated the video from the power.  I would just buy separate cables rather then this one in the future.  Even better buy shielded cabled to start with and this may resolve these issues.

Reviews.Title: Tough, flexible, odd choice for adapters
Reviews.Author: DrP
Reviews.Content: These video cables work fine for standard DC-powered, BNC video-feed cameras.  The one thing that robs them of their 5th star is the odd connectors shipped with them.  Most security cameras have BNC connectors, as do the display units.  The cables have female BNCs on each end, but male/female power jacks.  They ship with a pair of BNC-to-RCA adapters...useless for joining two cables together, and requires the installer (usually one of us do-it-yourselfers) to go to Radio Shack or Lowes to pick up BNC-to-BNC connectors (~$4).  Not a huge chore, but now I've got a whole stack of these useless BNC-to-RCA adapters.  If the power side was clearly built for extending cable reach, why not a male/female signal side...or include a singe BNC-BNC adapter?

Reviews.Title: Measure first
Reviews.Author: Adrian B Adams
Reviews.Content: It was just what I needed and I highly recommend that you order it in the beginning.  A 100 ft cord would have been just as useful, I am terrible at measuring, so make sure you measure accurately to see which one you need. It works great. Try to order the couplers that make the shorter wire longer, that helped also.

Reviews.Title: ALL GOOD
Reviews.Author: Frankie Clay
Reviews.Content: GOOD PRICE , CABLE DOES NOT FEEL LIKE IT WILL HOLD UP TO OUTSIDE WEATHER OTHER THEN THAT GREAT PRICE FOR THE AMOUNT OF CABLE WITH THE CLAMPS

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Robert K. Roloff
Reviews.Content: good price,didnt think i would be able to find a long enough and cheap enough replacement,and its better quality than original

Reviews.Title: VideoSecur 150 Feet Video power security camera cable.
Reviews.Author: Barbara Solomon
Reviews.Content: Its just what I expected it to be,was GREAT.I would recommend this product to anyone that wants durability in a cable line.

Reviews.Title: like
Reviews.Author: Chron34
Reviews.Content: I liked the price and that it got here in a timely manor but when it came to unwind them they got tangled up so badly like it took hours but I would still recommend this product

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Abdullah
Reviews.Content: i install my DVR system after i bought it but the wire it comes with it 30 feet then i got this 150 feet which is great stuffand the delevery did take  few days love it

Reviews.Title: even better length
Reviews.Author: K Clark "Patch"
Reviews.Content: I had the 100 foot. The 150 foot reached the far back rooms for ghost hunting.  Easily plugged into the zmodo system.Thanks.

Reviews.Title: This wire isn't hard to unwind
Reviews.Author: wolverly46
Reviews.Content: Wire came packaged. It seems that people are trying to unwind it from the ends. You have to pull the u shapped center out where the wire has been doubled. When fully pulled out the wire has then just been folded in half before it wound up for packaging. Wire is good quality and works great. I give it 2 thumbs up.

Reviews.Title: OK Product
Reviews.Author: jonnii
Reviews.Content: It works fine at this time. For picture quality, I don't expect this cable to bring that HD video. But it works to connect camera from my backyard.

Reviews.Title: Extremely pleased with my purchase
Reviews.Author: John Spane
Reviews.Content: This cable say it gives you the flexibility to reach those long places and I hanker or so forIt gives me the ability to keep a watchful eye on Hallmark aircraft now

Reviews.Title: Good purchase.
Reviews.Author: DMAR
Reviews.Content: This was just what I needed to complete my install.  I needed on cable just a little longer than the one's that came with the system.  It arrived as advertized.  Packaged well and on time.

Reviews.Title: Tips for installing your cable!
Reviews.Author: crobin1
Reviews.Content: The factory folded the cable in half and then rolled/coiled it. The easiest way to unroll is to unroll both ends at the same time until you run out of cable. Then separate the ends right down the middle and unravel the two strands. Once this is complete check to make sure you run the Camera end (power) to the camera and the other end goes to the power supply. I have done this with four rolls and it works great. My first roll was a nightmare (rats nest) because I unrolled just one end not realizing is was folded in half. Hope this helps!!!

Reviews.Title: Extra long CCTV cable
Reviews.Author: DAVID
Reviews.Content: It is not as heavy/thick build as my oem cables that came with cameras but it does the job.Was skeptical at the beginning, but run it continuously for more that 50 days in outdoor conditions and cannot say a negative word about this product. No problem with power nor video signal at all. I guess it is O.K.Thanx

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: david
Reviews.Content: Easy install. Great for the money. Use the online tutorials for the phone view set up. That part is hard if your not a computer pro.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Gives great picture. Hooked right up with no problems. Plenty long enough to run in our shop. Durable wires don't break easily.

Reviews.Title: its the bests and good for what we need
Reviews.Author: patty
Reviews.Content: it is what we need for are cameras to keep are home safe its what we needed and will run out to the back of the house

Reviews.Title: Great for extending previous wires
Reviews.Author: sammy toke
Reviews.Content: Its perfect! i was short with wires so i bought these for it! perfect for connecting to other wires. (you have to  have a BNC to BNC connecter!!!) Its a Great price for them too!

Reviews.Title: GREAT PART
Reviews.Author: Sandra Johnson
Reviews.Content: Perfect part allowed me to put cameras at other end of my business building to see everything that was out of range.

Reviews.Title: It worked great for me.. I'd order again.
Reviews.Author: Barry Steele "Barry"
Reviews.Content: It is a cable. It worked fine without degrading the picture. It even came with BNC-RCA adapters.  What more can I ask??

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: sam
Reviews.Content: The only reason im rating this item 2 stars is because the price was cheap. It is true you get what you pay for. 3 of the 4 cables i purchased would cut the video in and out just by accidentally bumping the connector. One was so bad i broke out my bnc crimpers and crimped another end on the cable it was so bad. The other con of this item is it instantly tangles upon trying to run it to your camera, regardless of how it is wound or which end you try to pull first it becomes a nice birds nest. I dont believe it is too much to ask to use a cheap cardboard tube to wind this cable on for the customers sake.

Reviews.Title: On the fence
Reviews.Author: Mo-z
Reviews.Content: Bought this for a security System that was defective and had to be returned cannot comment on this product as I have not yet replaced the security system and have not been able to use this cable.it does'nt seem to be all that well made and honestly seems to be of cheap quality.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: B. Fontenot
Reviews.Content: Delivery was received when promised, within a week.  Great product. This was needed because the 60ft cable was not long enough for some of the cameras we installed.

Reviews.Title: Decent but ok
Reviews.Author: dave
Reviews.Content: A thin wire but does the job,  no pressure in the wire or else fuzzy picture! No staplers or else throws the picture out of clearness!

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Kevin Vincent
Reviews.Content: It looks to be of good quality and was definitely a great deal. I'll update review if it turns out to be of inferior quality.

Reviews.Title: good but not rolled up very well
Reviews.Author: waverunner
Reviews.Content: good length for the cost and appeared to be rolled up right but when I started unraveling the cord, I was in a heap of mess having to constantly twist and unravel from both ends to keep it somewhat under control.  I bought a 100 ft of the same and did that one first and spent 30 min untangling.  This one did not get as bad simply because I learned on the first one and was more careful.  If its the best price out there, worth the purchase, just unravel slow and pay attention and should be OK.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Al Azim
Reviews.Content: It works great as it make it easy to set your camera at the end of your property, I have my camera inside metal building and it did not lose the picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Good to have
Reviews.Author: MamaHam
Reviews.Content: I bought four of these to go the extra distance for the surveillance cameras. The longer distance help to place the cameras for full view of the back yard and the side of the house.

Reviews.Title: Excellent quality at a really good price. HOOKED TO A LOREX CAMERA
Reviews.Author: arqrc
Reviews.Content: Cable arrived wrapped in plastic, with a plastic hook to easily extend as you desire. Is really long and well constructed. Came with 2 adapters. BNC to RCA.Works really good! I plug one side to a Q/see DVR, the other to a lorex camera. image quality s the same as the stock Q-see cables.Can't beat it for the price.Recommended!

Reviews.Title: Too long for standard cameras
Reviews.Author: N. Barabas
Reviews.Content: This basically did not work with my Zmodo H.264 security system.  On occasion a very weak picture would come through,but usually that DVR channel would say "no signal".  With the included 50 ft wire the camera and DVR worked fine.  SinceI occasionally got some signal, I know the wire was not broken.  Maybe this will work with better cameras, but don't buy it touse with the standard cameras.

Reviews.Title: Good stuff
Reviews.Author: John B.
Reviews.Content: It was just long enough, and it worked!  To add more words to make this an official review is a bit odd.  It's like the computer is telling me I can't possibly communicate a concept in so few words.  It dosen't know how much I hate typing.

Reviews.Title: the greatest
Reviews.Author: michael campbell
Reviews.Content: i did not have to have a 25ft to a 65ft cable.the 150 ft  cablegives me no single loss. glad for that

Reviews.Title: Unbelievable Mess
Reviews.Author: BrotherDave
Reviews.Content: I ordered 4 of these cables - they seem to be good quality, but the way that they're packaged is bad. The cable is rolled up as if on a spool, BUT there is NO SPOOL. Instead the cables are tied off by twist ties. This means that when you attempt to unroll & use the cable, it quickly becomes tangled up into a big "furball". I did not allow time to wrestle with the cable mess, so it really put me behind schedule about a half day. After some serious frustration I finally sat down and untangled the mess and re-rolled the wire up on some foam rubber. Then it's ok. Frankly I would have paid double not to have had to deal with this mess. I did not see any other reviews about this particular aspect of these cables and maybe there's some 'trick' to dealing with them, but I didn't see any option other than untangling them and rolling them back up on a makeshift spool so that as I'm fishing the cable through the attic it would unroll without tangling.

Reviews.Title: Too light weight for my application
Reviews.Author: Todd Logan
Reviews.Content: I bought a couple of these as the cables that came with my FirstAlert security system were 60' and I needed a few longer runs.  They were inexpensive, but I was surprised when they arrived in that they were even smaller in diameter than the 60'ers that came with my system, which seemed pretty lightweight already.  I installed them anyway, and was initially surprised what they seemed to work fine.  However, my cameras switch from regular to infrared mode after dark.  For whatever reason, these cables seemed to carry the daytime signals from the camera fine, but totally failed transmitting the night-time images.  I replaced them with large diameter cables I found locally (at $60 ea!) and the new cables work great.  Bottom line - these cables are a good deal IF they work for your application.  They may or may not.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Ralph C. Quinn
Reviews.Content: This was just what I needed to complete my surveillance system.Half buried in an armored shield and the rest exposed, but ti works just fine with no loss or degradation of video signal.

Reviews.Title: A ton of cable
Reviews.Author: Barbara E. Clancy
Reviews.Content: I ordered this cable & had more than enough.  I had two packages left.  I only wish I could have returned it.

Reviews.Title: Pain to Untangle
Reviews.Author: MIke
Reviews.Content: The wire works well, once its been untangled!  Expect to spend about 30+ minutes just untangling it.  All 3 of my rolls were tangled, even after the first attempt at unraveling it carefully!

Reviews.Title: ITS OK
Reviews.Author: Neil Middlecoat
Reviews.Content: CONNECTORS ARE A LITTLE LOOSE BUT MANAGED TO GET IT TO WORK, HOPE IT LASTS, IT'S WOKING OK FOR NOW.

Reviews.Title: worked perfectly
Reviews.Author: Karen Messina
Reviews.Content: This made our installation easiser and seamless.  Our cameras are working perfectly now and it was easy to install.  Nice

Reviews.Title: Good Cable but it is difficult to unwrap.
Reviews.Author: Ivrit, Hebrew, Israel, American, Jew
Reviews.Content: The cable works fine.  But Jesus Christ it took us a solid hour in the 90-100 degree heat to unravel the cable.  If you are installing security systems for a living make sure you unwind this cable somewhere where the client doesn't watch you make an ass out of yourself unwinding this stuff.  There were two of us today putting this up on our home.  We got this 150ft of cable installed and the picture quality of the video feed is clear an colorful and is no different than the other three cables that are 65ft.  So I'm happy with it.  But because of the unnecessary hassle of unwinding it I'm only giving it four stars for a rating.

Reviews.Title: No problems at all
Reviews.Author: Jordan Grove
Reviews.Content: Had absolutely no problems with either the installation or the operation of this cable.  Routed thru both indoor and outdoor areas, and it is holding up just fine.  Very slight degradation in picture, but that is to be expected on a long run.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: J. Pensacola
Reviews.Content: The only reason I gave these 4 stars is because of the price. For $25, I would have expected to get the female-to-female connectors with these.

Reviews.Title: Very thin
Reviews.Author: Powerstrokin
Reviews.Content: Woks fine the wire is very thin dont know if could handle hi def but works fine for my cameras and at a good price

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Misty6912
Reviews.Content: I have looked everywhere for this, found it here. Thank you for your quick delivery, having what I needed for the job, and your product.

Reviews.Title: Just like the one received with my system but longer
Reviews.Author: Sean Edmonds
Reviews.Content: I already have cameras in the front of my house and needed to run cables to the back of the house. The included cables are to small (60') so I needed longer ones. I checked several sources and found these at Amazon for a great price.I purchased this about 2 years ago and it is still going strong with no issues. I ran it under the eve of the house to get it around to the back yard.Nice product for the price.

Reviews.Title: the cables were in excess
Reviews.Author: Avery
Reviews.Content: The cables were complimentary with the defender system, this was not explained in the advert  therefore I would not have oredered it. So I weas not able to use it.

Reviews.Title: exactly what I was looking for.
Reviews.Author: Greg Lougheed
Reviews.Content: I needed a longer cable for my Sons Security system and the prices where more than I wanted to pay.I'm so glad I found these on Amazon.thank you amazon

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: ct
Reviews.Content: This cable is great for the price I over bought because of it. I use it for my home security system I have no complaints at all. But If I could do it all over again I would spend a few extra bucks and buy a wireless system to avoid the holes/drilling and wires showing.

Reviews.Title: Everything I've always wanted
Reviews.Author: Blake Paff
Reviews.Content: I have been waiting my whole life to buy something like this.  Finally the day has come and now I get to write about it on here.  It is the best darn cable that I guy could ask for.  Thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: JUST WHAT I NEEDED.
Reviews.Author: Janice L. Piatt
Reviews.Content: I NEEDED SOME LONGER CABLE TO INSTALL A VIDEO CAMERA.  THIS CABLE IS IDENTICAL TO THE ONES INCLUDED IN THE PACKAGE.

Reviews.Title: The best value which you can get.
Reviews.Author: Jerry
Reviews.Content: Break-in burgalry incidents around my neighborhood has been up like crazy. Video 150 Feet Video Power Camera Cable just provides me the connect which I need to move my security camera around my house, if needed. I have been using this cable for 5-6 months. So far so good.

Reviews.Title: didnt need it but I have it
Reviews.Author: Jack strickland
Reviews.Content: I didn't need it but if I decide to move a camera I will have the cable. Remember " plug and play " that simple.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Ivy Brinson
Reviews.Content: This fit my DEFENDER 21030 SENTINEL 8-Channel Smart Security DVR. I needed longer cable and this worked great without any problems.

Reviews.Title: This cable does the job
Reviews.Author: Trilobite
Reviews.Content: I just installed three of these cables this past weekend.  There were no surprises.  The quality seems to be good and the cables are doing their job.  I really don't have much of a reason not to give a 5 star rating.

Reviews.Title: 150 feet security camera cable
Reviews.Author: Beachmombyron
Reviews.Content: Great purchase, good quality, great price.Would definitely recommend to friends and plan on making another purchase in the future.

Reviews.Title: better than kit
Reviews.Author: Student for Life
Reviews.Content: Fairly easy to unspool.  Connectors have had no problems yet, which is more than I can say for the 60' cables that came with my system.

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: Shard
Reviews.Content: Worked well, had plenty of length to reach the cameras.Adapters were nice to have. Not much else you can say about a cable.

Reviews.Title: This is an average cable, similar to the ones that ship with surveillance systems
Reviews.Author: HoneyBeesBliss "Melissa"
Reviews.Content: It works fine. I used cable staples to run it along the eaves of my house. The cables that came with my surveillance system were 100 feet long and one of them didn't reach the room where I have the DVR so I bought this to supplement. The quality of the picture is fine, it looks just like the cameras on the 100 footers, but then again I am using a low definition system. I can't complain about this cable, it worked when I plugged it in and that's all I needed.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely perfect.
Reviews.Author: David Detwiler
Reviews.Content: These cords are twice the length of the OEM cords, but other than that they are identical. Single run no splices jst what I needed.

Reviews.Title: Good cables
Reviews.Author: Antnony Cilluffo
Reviews.Content: Good quality cable made out  of good material. Get good quality picture And no distortion. Recommend them to anyone who does surveillance equipment

Reviews.Title: Hey it works
Reviews.Author: David Lewis
Reviews.Content: Really thin wire. But not much to say. Ran the cable through suspended ceiling, got tugged a little, scraped a litlle. In the end it worked.

Reviews.Title: siamese video cable
Reviews.Author: B. Wagner
Reviews.Content: I used this at an apartment complex that has fifteen cameras outdoors.  Some of the cameras have been in use with similar cables for over two years and no problems.  Easy to install and reliable.

Reviews.Title: strong no defects!
Reviews.Author: Maxim Deviza
Reviews.Content: I needed it for 100 feet distance from the office to the parking lot, worked perfect! good product! Will buy again soon.

Reviews.Title: Security cables great
Reviews.Author: kay
Reviews.Content: The ones that came with my system were not long enough. The seller was prompt and I received them in a timely manor. They were packages well. Everything was really taken care of to my satisfaction. What more can I say, after hooking them up they worked excellent. even better than the ones that came with my cameras.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Jessica Ward
Reviews.Content: It is Just as described. No complaints. Plenty of cable to get the job done. I would highly reccomend this product.

Reviews.Title: works well
Reviews.Author: Mike Anderson
Reviews.Content: have had it hooked up for months now and no problems. I had to reconnect one of the cables because it snapped while feeding it through the wall and it works fine.

Reviews.Title: Worth it
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Bought these to use with the camera I ordered. I love it. It's extra long. Definitely need them to go with the camera

Reviews.Title: Quick delivery
Reviews.Author: JS
Reviews.Content: Have not used the cables yet, but seems as though should work fine. I will test before wiring, just to make sure and save time in the event there is an issue

Reviews.Title: 300 feet cables
Reviews.Author: Raypa
Reviews.Content: I ordered 8 of those and all working perfectly and they are use as 300 ft cables for each camera

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Juan R Rivera Rivera II
Reviews.Content: good video security 150 feet video power security camera cable outstanding cable, good service and I will buy another cable with this guy.

Reviews.Title: video feed cables
Reviews.Author: Robert Gault
Reviews.Content: Great cables, worked fine BUT, the ends are not marked "video camera" or DVR". We strung both cables to my garage. One cable we ran through the conduit backwards. Not happy with myself. But I was able to get it rewired without too much of a problem. It would have been nice if they were labeled like the ones that came with the cameras.

Reviews.Title: Good as new
Reviews.Author: William J. Connelly
Reviews.Content: Not a lot you can say about a longer cord... it works and to my knowledge it WAS/IS 100 feet... I didn't measure it I just ran the darn thing and had enough to get to where I was going with it. It works fine and that's all I have to say about that.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Matthew
Reviews.Content: perfect for wiring of surveillance systems. adaptors included to enable plugging into VCRs DVRs or computers for recording and has an added power supply cable

Reviews.Title: more than 8 months with no problem
Reviews.Author: GOGO LLC
Reviews.Content: so far so good, no problem at all. i'm using it outdoor for my system, right price for quality .

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased!
Reviews.Author: Robert M.
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these when I purchased a video monitoring system for my home.  The quality of the cameras hooked up to this cable are just as good as the 60' cables that came with the system.  The first one I ended up getting tangled up and it took awhile to untangle because I tried to unwind one end at a time. I found out on the second one that if you unwind both ends at the same time there is no problem at all.  If you order one of these, keep that in mind.Overall, I am very happy with my purchase of these cables. They do what they are supposed to do and have a great price.

Reviews.Title: PLENTY OF REACH
Reviews.Author: Monsi L'Ggrke
Reviews.Content: These 150 feet cables are great for distant places for affixing cameras and other devices around need security buildings and high end vehicles.

Reviews.Title: Great cable
Reviews.Author: M Sparks Jr "spark_plug_y2k"
Reviews.Content: Cable is just right for my camera.  I like the fact that I'm not restricted to a small area.  With this cable I can mount the camera just about anywhere.

Reviews.Title: Did the job I needed it to do..
Reviews.Author: Ron I "Ron I"
Reviews.Content: I bought these cables as the 60 foot cable that came with my system wasn't anywhere near long enough to reach where i needed it to go on our home..These cable's solved the problem.  Just be careful because they tangle very easy..

Reviews.Title: really long
Reviews.Author: whatIthink
Reviews.Content: this was crazy long but I am now able to run a cable to my camera out by the hot tub and in the house, to the second floor where my system is. its also a bit thinner and easy to sort of make use of "available space" to hide it as i run it temporarily through the house. I would be careful not to bend this too much or pinch it in any doors. but I did run this outside through a door by simply trimming a tiny bit of weather proofing off the top of the door where there is a bit of a gap.update, its still working jsut find and I moved the cable and installed it properly in the walls now.I also picked up another, as I needed two outdoor cameras that would not reach on the sytems 60ft long cables. they are holding up to outdoor weather and a run through the attic. the images come out great on the other end.  they do want to tangle on you and I have extra length of this but I put a twist tie on it and put it in a baggie to keep it neat, you never know when I might want to move a camera farther out and need the length. it fits my swann system perfectly.

Reviews.Title: GREAT ITEM
Reviews.Author: elio ulloa
Reviews.Content: GREAT ITEM,  VERY EASY TO CONNECT TO MY EXISTING LINE. GOOD CHOICE FOR ANYONE WANTING TO EXTEND OR MOVE CAMERA TO A NEW LOCATION.

Reviews.Title: It is what it is.
Reviews.Author: John A. Davis
Reviews.Content: It is what it is. Dose the job with very thin wire. I see no difference with this and the heaver wires on my security system.

Reviews.Title: Cables not plenum rated
Reviews.Author: numbersgirl
Reviews.Content: I spoke with the supplier "VideoSecu" to find out if these cables are plenum rated.  They said that they are not plenum rated.  Plenum rated cable will not allow a fire to continue burning and spread. This doesn't mean the wires will work: all wires will eventually melt under heat. It is just that they won't be the fuel for the fire.  I wish these were plenum rated.

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: William Elwell
Reviews.Content: I need these to get to some camera's far away and they worked perfectly for me.  Camera's work great and these were a big help.

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: LadyPink
Reviews.Content: Its a little smaller in diameter that ones that are sold at Lorex.We have been having problems with video on the camera its on, but not sure if its the camera or the cable.

Reviews.Title: A good cable for the price
Reviews.Author: A. Medvecky "Bee Lady"
Reviews.Content: A cable for your security camera system that is value priced without all of the mark-ups that the big names add on to it.

Reviews.Title: Great Quality
Reviews.Author: S. Hinds
Reviews.Content: On receiving this item, I was impressed by the craftmanship that was shown.  The item was well put together and of high quality products it would appear.  I purchased this item to fullfill a need, and it has gone above my expectations.  Very impressive.

Reviews.Title: Video cable
Reviews.Author: Drew
Reviews.Content: Product works well and great price. No issues with video feed as some have posted. The only issue was with unspooling the cable from the manufacture, I had to layout the cable and untangle many, many times before the install.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Clyde Douglas
Reviews.Content: For the price this is a good quality cable. It works very well even for long distance runs. I would recommend

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Scotty
Reviews.Content: I use varying lengths of video cables in my work, these cables proved to be an extremely handy option in the field.

Reviews.Title: extension cable
Reviews.Author: Joseph Valenta
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for the system i installed at my house just incase what came with was not long enough.  But it was not needed, came in on time and was just what I was looking for.

Reviews.Title: Solid connections .
Reviews.Author: Michael P Owens
Reviews.Content: This is a good all around cable for video or separate audio use. Have used over twenty and had no culls.

Reviews.Title: Nice cable
Reviews.Author: Buddy
Reviews.Content: We are pleased with the manufacturing of the cable and how the plugs are connected to the cable. Of course a 150' roll of cable is a little hard to unwind without getting a tangled up mess as what happened to us.

Reviews.Title: Very Good
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Very Good Service I am not interested in writing 17 words I have already said All I Have to Say

Reviews.Title: From here to there
Reviews.Author: DodgeD
Reviews.Content: This is a good product, works well and is nicely constructed I have also a one hundred foot long and a One fifty foot length ones also excellent.

Reviews.Title: 150ft cord
Reviews.Author: JUCD VPR
Reviews.Content: Works well as it is intended to. Not much to review. Just know this is NOT for audio, just video and power feed wires. Works great for mounting cameras on my garage away from my house.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu 150 Feet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Easy to use with our security system and allowed us to place the remote cameras where we wanted to expand our system.

Reviews.Title: Works, but too much noise
Reviews.Author: Heng Hu
Reviews.Content: The cable is in the same quality as the cable came with my CCTV camera. However because it's too long, there are notable signal lose/noise. Image from this cable is not clear compared to shorter cable. I suggest people to not buy longer than 100FT cable.

Reviews.Title: Bird nest
Reviews.Author: kevin r morgan
Reviews.Content: The cable worked well but even though it looked neat in the package it was a bird nest. It took 45min. to untangle the mess.

Reviews.Title: Work great
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "hwilli79997"
Reviews.Content: We got two of the 150 ft. Cores for our new system and they work just great the cores that came with our security was ok but needed two longer ones and so we ordered them and they work great.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu 150 Feet Video Power Security Camera
Reviews.Author: fjhh
Reviews.Content: Good quality, video works fine, saw no difference between 50', 100' and 150' cables.  You will need a cable longer than you think.

Reviews.Title: Like what came with the cameras but longer
Reviews.Author: Bob Bunting
Reviews.Content: Just like the cable that came with my Swanview DVR and camera kit - just longer.  It has been working well with a  security camera.  I see no difference in the picture when compared with the 60ft cables that came with the cameras.  Very good price.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: robzbsmrt
Reviews.Content: since i had to customize my camera runs, the system i bought had the standard cable lengths. looked locally for the cables but unsuccessful. was happy to find them here and now my system is up and running thanks to these cables!!

Reviews.Title: 150 Feet Video Power Cable
Reviews.Author: entity247
Reviews.Content: Great price. it doesn't lose hardly any picture quality for the distance. The cord is vary small, about 20 gage. Worth buying for sure.

Reviews.Title: Great Wires for the Price
Reviews.Author: Dilip
Reviews.Content: These wires are great for the price I had bought some cameras and needed 3 long wires the reach from one end of the building to the other.  The wire do not feel cheap, and the are very well built, the image quality is also good. I would recommend there wires.

Reviews.Title: Quality at an affordable price!
Reviews.Author: Gregg Cornett
Reviews.Content: Just what is needed for longer video camera runs. Have used this item in less than ideal conditions expecting possible signal interference but the cable proved to be up to the task. Was pleasantly surprised with the end result of a superior signal. Great value for the money.

Reviews.Title: It's a Cable.
Reviews.Author: Youper0
Reviews.Content: It Works, but its a bit long for my comfort, I thought it was rg-58, so its my mistake, but if you need a cheap piece of cable.... it'll work

Reviews.Title: Worked better than a more expensive cable
Reviews.Author: Christopher L. Bowerman "wizz"
Reviews.Content: I purchased a more expensive cable from Fry's thinking it would give me a better picture "wrong" I had to spend 2 extra hours removing it and running this one which was cheaper and the picture was 100% better. sometimes bigger isn't always better!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: ValleyViewParanormalSociety
Reviews.Content: We ordered 4 of these. They were a good quality. Was worried about loss of picture quality but wasn't a problem. Overall a great product at an exceptionally great price! Thank you for shipping them so quickly!!!! We can now use them on an upcoming investigation!!!

Reviews.Title: Still waiting for the security systems
Reviews.Author: VICTOR E. RODRIGUEZ
Reviews.Content: This product arrived two says after i ordered. But i"m  still waiting for the security system  the overall rating for the cable is good. In the future if a costumer order two products please make sure they arrived togheter.

Reviews.Title: It must work great! I haven't tried it yet, as I over stocked on this one.. but I will keep it around...
Reviews.Author: jspaz22
Reviews.Content: Yes! This Item is very sweet to look at. Being as I have not put it to use yet. My camera's came with cords, and I really don't want to put a camera upstairs at the moment.. oops! (security breach, security breach, step away from the door, and put your hands behind your head!) jk of course… but no, I just haven't had the need for it. But like I said, It is beautiful in the room to look at. It has very sexy prongs.. ok-let's not go there… but you get the jest of things… I simply over-bought for the time being.. Maybe I will a reverse Bunk-Cake! peace & love

Reviews.Title: Heck of a good deal
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Really shipped them fast too, you couldn't beat their price, I shopped around for a length that was shorter and this was perfect 2 for one great price for what one shorter length would have cost....

Reviews.Title: alot of cable
Reviews.Author: Marcela Terrell
Reviews.Content: it was a lot of cable more than we needed but it cover the house and happy with it.  Great price too

Reviews.Title: That,s a lot of whire
Reviews.Author: George
Reviews.Content: This cable will extend the camera site, one hundred and fifty feet pluse one hundred and seventy feet more should keep a good eye on the wood,s.

Reviews.Title: Not real CCTV cable
Reviews.Author: ronco
Reviews.Content: First,,i have not hooked this up yet.I am almost afraid to.Consider that i have three cameras hooked to full size cable tv type cable and getting this with all three wires together only being about 1/4 the size of just the video coax i use now..if i knew it was going to be so light weight i would not have ordered it..i cannot see how it can be self supporting over a long run without some support help.if it dont perform well i wont lose much for the price so i guess that is a plus.If it does perform well i will be pleasantlly surprised !!In video and power transmission " line loss " is a BIG consideration..small wire has HUGE line loss.think of how your small extension cords wont run much when they are 150 ft long !For people that cant get full sized RG cable or dont  want to pay the price this may be the only option.My suggestion if affordable,full size RG58 and good power wire and put your own ends on.cant do that ?? try this and hope for the best.

Reviews.Title: junk
Reviews.Author: Mrks1 "mrks"
Reviews.Content: This cable will not work if you expect to have a clear image. Make your own out of RG6 cable and you will not believe the difference.

Reviews.Title: Bad video quality
Reviews.Author: Alex Secerator "Mold"
Reviews.Content: had to return it because of bad image quality.I had some 60 ft cables for my q-see cameras, and I needed one longer.The image quality suffered a lot when using this cable.Switched to cat 5 with baluns and got great quality.probably is due to the length of 150 ft or cheap built.. (the original cables I have are cheap built too, good quality of video).Bought it with free shipping, after returning it, I was refunded only like $8 (minus $6 shipping) from the $15 order.Spend your money somewhere else.

Reviews.Title: Cheap, delicate cable
Reviews.Author: E. Bixby
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these cables for my security system and they are NOT rugged at all.  The power and signal wires inside the larger cable are easily damaged and will short out the camera.  The first time I installed the cable, I got no signal at all.  So I used the second cable and kept checking the picture as I went along--after 20 feet of installation, the signal got fuzzy and wouldn't correct.  I do NOT recommend these cables.

ProductInfo.Features:
All in one video and power cable
Plug and plug ready
Cable functions for bnc or rca connection.
150 Feet video/power cable in black
2 bnc to rca adapter included
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 150 Feet Video Power Security Camera Cable for CCTV Surveillance DVR System Installation 1LY
